import React from"react";import{AiOutlineTwitter}from"react-icons/ai";import{IoLogoWhatsapp}from"react-icons/io";import{BsFacebook}from"react-icons/bs";import{FaLinkedinIn}from"react-icons/fa";import{ImEmbed}from"react-icons/im";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{showModal}from"../../features/modalSlice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShareItem=_ref=>{let{item}=_ref;const{onClick,Icon,title}=item;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"share__item",onClick:onClick,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:title})]});};const Share=_ref2=>{let{post}=_ref2;const dispatch=useDispatch();const copyURL=()=>{window.navigator.clipboard.writeText("https://adra-amie.netlify.app/post/".concat(post._id));dispatch(showModal({msg:"URL copied to clipboard"}));};const copyEmbed=()=>{window.navigator.clipboard.writeText("<iframe
				src="https://adra-amie.netlify.app/post/".concat(post._id,"?embed=true"
				width="500"
				height="700"
				title="social-media-app"
			></iframe>"));dispatch(showModal({msg:"Copied embed code to clipboard"}));};const shareToUrls={twitter:"https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=".concat(post.caption,"&url=https://adra-amie.netlify.app/post/").concat(post._id),facebook:"https://www.facebook.com/dialog/share?
		app_id=287203076842060
		&display=popup
		&href=https://adra-amie.netlify.app/post/".concat(post._id,"
		&redirect_uri=https://adra-amie.netlify.app/post/").concat(post._id),linkedin:"https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https://adra-amie.netlify.app/post/".concat(post._id),whatsapp:"https://api.whatsapp.com/send/?text=".concat(post.caption," Link: https://adra-amie.netlify.app/post/").concat(post._id)};const shareTo=dest=>{window.open(shareToUrls[dest],"_blank");};const shareItems=[{title:"Embed",onClick:copyEmbed,Icon:ImEmbed},{title:"Whatsapp",onClick:()=>shareTo("whatsapp"),Icon:IoLogoWhatsapp},{title:"Facebook",onClick:()=>shareTo("facebook"),Icon:BsFacebook},{title:"Twitter",onClick:()=>shareTo("twitter"),Icon:AiOutlineTwitter},{title:"Linked In",onClick:()=>shareTo("linkedin"),Icon:FaLinkedinIn}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"share",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Share"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"share__items",children:shareItems.map((item,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ShareItem,{item:item},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"share__url",children:[post._id,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:copyURL,children:"Copy URL"})]})]});};export default Share;
